SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.game

Interface GameModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game
public interface GameModel
The game's interface. It contains all the methods a game can use.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • getId

      String getId()
      Returns:
      The game's ID.

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(String username) throws UnexpectedActionException
      Adds a new player into the game. The number of players cannot exceed numPlayers.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game is already full, if the game has already started, or if there is already a player with the same username present in the game.

    • removePlayer

      void removePlayer(String username) throws UnexpectedActionException
      Removes a player from the game. This method can only be used in the initial phase of the game.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player to be removed. If a player with the given username does not exist, this method does nothing.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if an attempt was made to remove a player from a game which has already started.

    • getNumPlayers

      int getNumPlayers()
      Returns:
      The non-variable number of players expected to play the game.

    • getCurrentPlayerCount

      int getCurrentPlayerCount()
      Returns:
      The number of players who joined the game.

    • setConnected

      void setConnected(String username, boolean connected)
      Sets a player's connection status.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      connected - Whether the player is connected.

    • everybodyConnected

      boolean everybodyConnected()
      Returns:
      whether all the players in this game are connected.

    • getActivePlayer

      String getActivePlayer()
      Returns:
      The username of the player who is currently playing.

    • getStartingPlayer

      String getStartingPlayer()
      Returns:
      The username of the player whose turn is the first.

    • getWinnerUsernames

      List<String> getWinnerUsernames()
      Returns:
      The id(s) of the player(s) who won.

    • initializeGame

      void initializeGame() throws UnexpectedActionException
      Initializes the game by drawing the common gold and resource cards, and distributing the starter cards to the players.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game was already initialized, or if the game hasn't reached the required number of players.

    • setPlayerStarterSide

      void setPlayerStarterSide(String username, SideType side) throws UnexpectedActionException, NoStarterCardException
      Lets the player choose the side of their starter card. It can be either front or back.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      side - The card's side.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game has already started, hence all players should have already chosen their starter card side.
      NoStarterCardException

    • setPlayerColor

      void setPlayerColor(String username, PlayerColor color) throws UnexpectedActionException
      Sets the color of a player.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      color - The color a player chose.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game has already started, hence all the players should have already chosen their color, or if the given color has already been chosen by another player.

    • getAvailableColors

      List<PlayerColor> getAvailableColors()
      Returns:
      A List containing all the colors that are still available for a player to choose.

    • allPlayersChoseStarterSide

      boolean allPlayersChoseStarterSide()
      Returns:
      Whether all the players have chosen the side of their starter card.

    • allPlayersChoseColor

      boolean allPlayersChoseColor()
      Returns:
      Whether all the players have chosen their color.

    • distributeCards

      void distributeCards()
      Distributes two resource cards and a gold card so that the game can start.

    • initializeObjectives

      void initializeObjectives()
      Draws the common objective cards and distributes the personal objectives to the players. This method should only be called after everyone has chosen their starter card side and color.

    • setPlayerObjective

      void setPlayerObjective(String username, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard) throws UnexpectedActionException, UnknownObjectiveCardException
      Sets the chosen objective card for a specific player.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      objectiveCard - The chosen objective card.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the objectives have not yet been distributed, or the game has already started, or the given player has already chosen their objective.
      UnknownObjectiveCardException

    • allPlayersChoseObjective

      boolean allPlayersChoseObjective()
      Returns:
      Whether all the players have chosen their personal objective.

    • startGame

      void startGame() throws UnexpectedActionException
      Starts the game by choosing the starting player and distributing the resource and gold cards.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game has already been started, or if not all players have chosen their objective card.

    • placeCard

      void placeCard(String username, PlayableCard placedCard, SideType side, Position newCardPos) throws IllegalMoveException, UnexpectedActionException
      Lets a player place a card.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      placedCard - The card the player wants to place.
      side - The chosen card's side.
      newCardPos - The position of the card.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - Thrown if the player made an illegal move.
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if this method is called before the game has been started.

    • drawCard

      PlayableCard drawCard(String username, DrawType drawType) throws UnexpectedActionException, IllegalMoveException
      Lets the player draw a card. A card can be drawn from the deck or from the currently visible cards. If the card is drawn from one of the common cards, it is replaced with a card of the same type if available. If a card of the same type is not available, it is replaced with a card of the other type.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      drawType - The place a player wants to draw a card from.
      Returns:
      The drawn card.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if this method is called before the game has been started.
      IllegalMoveException - Thrown if a draw is attempted from an empty deck, or from an empty common card slot.

    • advanceTurn

      void advanceTurn() throws UnexpectedActionException
      Advances the turn to the next player.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game not started yet, or if it has already ended.

    • checkFinalRound

      boolean checkFinalRound()
      Returns:
      Whether the game is ready to enter the final round.

    • triggerFinalRound

      void triggerFinalRound() throws UnexpectedActionException
      Triggers the game to enter the final round, if it is ready to do so; otherwise, this method does nothing.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game has not started yet, or if it has already ended.

    • endGame

      void endGame() throws UnexpectedActionException
      Ends the current game and evaluates the objective points of the players. Then, it selects a winner.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game has not yet entered its final round, or if it has already ended.

    • getPlayers

      Map<String,Player> getPlayers()
      Returns:
      The players inside the game.

    • getCommonObjectiveCards

      ObjectiveCard[] getCommonObjectiveCards()
      Returns:
      The common objective cards.

    • getCommonGoldCards

      PlayableCard[] getCommonGoldCards()
      Returns:
      The visible and drawable gold cards.

    • getCommonResourceCards

      PlayableCard[] getCommonResourceCards()
      Returns:
      The visible and drawable resource cards.

    • getState

      GameState getState()
      Returns:
      the game's state.

    • isRejoiningAfterCrash

      boolean isRejoiningAfterCrash()
      Returns:
      whether the players are rejoining after a server crash.

    • getResourceDeckTopType

      ResourceType getResourceDeckTopType()
      Returns:
      the type of the card on top of the resource deck. This information should be visible to the players.

    • getGoldDeckTopType

      ResourceType getGoldDeckTopType()
      Returns:
      the type of the card on top of the gold deck. This information should be visible to the player.

    • getTurnOrder

      List<String> getTurnOrder()
      Returns:
      a list containing the usernames of the players in the order in which they play.

    • pause

      void pause()
      Pauses the game. Used when a player disconnects from the game.
